body_html: Thanks for raising this issue. Do you have any suggestions on how to make it clearer? Perhaps you could provide a PR to make it clearer. If you know what the SparseTensor is, even having even this description is redundant (it seems not scalable to include detailed documentation on the semantics of sparse tensors in every routine that takes one). Should it perhaps link to the SparseTensor documentation?

body: Thanks for raising this issue. Do you have any suggestions on how to make it clearer? Perhaps you could provide a PR to make it clearer. If you know what the SparseTensor is, even having even this description is redundant (it seems not scalable to include detailed documentation on the semantics of sparse tensors in every routine that takes one). Should it perhaps link to the SparseTensor documentation?
